title: The [Not] Satisfied Dragon
description: Once upon a time, there was a gold dragon who would have given her life in exchange for her revenge. ​​​​​​​The (Not) Satisfied Dragon is book two of the Deadly Dragons Duet. It is a slow burn, reverse harem romance for readers 18+​​​​​​​​​​​​​​TW: Flashbacks of abuse
author: Colette Rhodes
